description.value:
You gain one of the following abilities of your choice. You can Dismiss this spell.

  • You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.j6po934p4jcUVC6l]{20-foot status bonus to your Speed}.
  • You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nbW4udOUTrCGL3Gf]{climb} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Um25D1qLtZWOSBny]{swim} Speed equal to half your Speed.
  • You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.A48jNUOAmCljx8Ru]{darkvision}.
  • You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.14AFzcwkN019dzcl]{pair of claws}. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage.
  • You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.byXkHIKFwuKrZ55M]{scent 60 feet (imprecise)}.
